Text:
I am absolutely shocked to find a 9/11 truth torrent on here that is free of trolls!

Kudos on being one of the few uploaders left who doesn't make our cause look bad by using the same kind of baseless, uneducated arguments as those who laugh at us.

Let the fools laugh...let them laugh loudly and spew there lies to those who know no better...all we can do is keep on telling those willing to listen
Total respect to Revised for his part in providing truth....end of may 2008...the id cards, in the begining you,ll be asked to carry them with you...then later..you will be fined for not producing your id card...then you will be arrested and imprisoned for failure to produce your id card because that will imply that you may be a terrorist..no day in court to defend yourself..no jury to aquit you...no lawyer to meet you once your inside your new confidential concentration camp inside America.
